text: Nico de Bree (16 September 1944 – 6 May 2016) was a Dutch footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. De Bree started his professional career at local club Elinkwijk. He moved to N.E.C. in 1966. After playing 204 matches for the Nijmegen club,Oud-doelman Nico de Bree overleden - NEC Nijmegen he moved to play in Belgium and won the 1975 league title with RWDM.RWDM 1975: vooral Jan Boskamp gaf de doorslag - Voetbal International He won the 1978 UEFA Cup Winners' Cup with Anderlecht.Voormalig topkeeper van NEC en Anderlecht overleden - AD Nico De Bree, titré avec le RWDM et Anderlecht, est décédé - RTBF He also played for Winterslag and Beerschot.Ex-Anderlecht-doelman Nico de Bree is overleden - Sporza He died of cancer in Vienna on 6 May 2016, aged 71. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Austria Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from Utrecht (city)
title: Nico de Bree
